tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE risk_factors (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  symbol VARCHAR(50),
  historical_volatility DECIMAL(10,2),
  trading_losses DECIMAL(15,2)
)

CREATE TABLE historical_volatility_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    daily_volatility DECIMAL,
    annualized_volatility DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE trading_losses (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    loss_amount DECIMAL,
    reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE risk_evaluations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    risk_level VARCHAR(50),
    evaluation_result TEXT
);
